title: NSXGT Racing Driver Jeff Segal
description: Jeff Segal has been a professional racing driver since his early 20s, racing Ferraris, BMWs, Maseratis, and now the new Acura NSXGT. He joined us while in town to race at the Long Beach Grand Prix, to talk about car setups, simulators, tuning challenges, and a whole lot more. This was a great show, and we wish him luck on April 8th.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
